thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Carol

author: Carol
title: Carol
text: I really enjoyed my trip to Myanmar. I'm not usually a fan of group holydays, but this one was an exception. Our guide, Su, was so experienced. Not only in her knowledge of her country but also her enthusiasm, which brought every temple visit and activity to life. She was so warm and friendly which soon permeated through the Group and before long we felt like besties. The actual tour was busy, without being exhausting and there were always alternatives for those not wanting to participate fully in activities. Accommodation was at the level described, but the highlight there was our stay at the Community Lodge. Transport was also good. I have to say that Su made every effort to make our experience as fulfilling as possible
